AISTATS*09 Local Information

Tourist information for St. Petersburg & Clearwater, Florida, including an online visitors guide.

Airports

  • Tampa (20 miles from hotel)
  • St. Petersburg - Clearwater (15 miles from hotel)

The Hilton has a list of local attractions on its website as well.
